subtitles:
176919 179479 - Oh, God...
- Keep your shit together.
179560 182519 If you wanna get 'em out of here.

183319 185880 - I can pop these, no problem.
- So get to it!
199519 201920 Security, we have a break-in. Get the...

210040 212760 I know who you are.
I know what you think...

212839 216519 If you don't wanna get hurt,
keep your mouth shut and don't move.

216600 221639 The chimps are infected. They're highly
contagious. They've been given an inhibitor.

221720 225039 - Infected with what?
- To cure, you must first understand.

233279 236319 - What is he talking about?
- Get the cages open.

238359 242479 Listen, you sick bastard,
we're taking your torture victims with us.
242560 244080 We'll get you out of here.

244160 248639 The animals are contagious. The infection
is in their blood and saliva. One bite...
265280 267319 Get it off! Get it off!

270800 273879 - What's the matter with her?
- You have to kill her!

282200 285279 - What's the matter with her?
- We have to kill her now!

962039 964799 - What the fuck is going on?
- Just shut up!

972599 975079 - Covered everything.
- Who are those people?

1002560 1004720 - What the fuck is going on?
- Just move!

1033479 1038039 Man walks into a bar with a giraffe.
They each get pissed.

1040120 1045119 The man goes to leave and the barman says
"Oi! You can't leave that lying there."
1045200 1049080 He says "No, it's not a lion. It's a giraffe".
1059239 1062039 You two should get on like a house on fire.

1068560 1071919 - Are you a doctor?
- He's not a doctor. He's a patient.

1076320 1082479 I was riding a package from Farringdon to
Shaftesbury Avenue and a car cut across me.

1082559 1086159 Then I wake up today in hospital.
I wake up and I'm...

1110679 1116680 It started as rioting, and right from
the beginning you knew this was different.

1116759 1120760 Because it was happening
in small villages, market towns.
1121600 1124240 And then it wasn't on the TV any more.

1124319 1128839 It was in the street outside.
It was coming through your windows.
1132560 1135279 You didn't need a doctor to tell you that.
1137800 1140199 There was something in the blood.

1141599 1146359 By the time they tried to evacuate
the cities, it was already too late.
1153199 1155800 And that's when the exodus started.

1159839 1163359 there were reports of Infection
in Paris and New York.
1165640 1168439 We didn't hear anything more after that.

1171280 1174120 - What's the government doing?
- There's no government.

1176640 1180560 There's always a government.
They're in a bunker or a plane...

1180639 1184759 No, there's no government,
no police, no army.
1186159 1189120 No TV, no radio, no electricity.

1189719 1193719 You're the first uninfected person
we've seen in six days.

1211359 1215199 Look, I have to find them.
They live in Deptford. I can walk it. OK?
1215280 1217760 You'll go and come back, yeah?

1231920 1236160 You never go anywhere alone
unless you've got no choice.

1238559 1242480 Only travel during daylight.
Unless you've got no choice.

1246479 1249919 We'll all go and find
your dead parents together, OK?

1264000 1267039 If you want her to slow down,
you'll have to say.

1424679 1428479 They died peacefully.
You should be grateful.

1434679 1439000 parents and my sister,
we went to Paddington Station,

1441519 1446639 hoping maybe we could get on a plane,
maybe we could buy our way onto a plane.
1447240 1449519 I remember my dad had all this cash,
1449600 1452799 even though cash was completely useless.
1454279 1457280 About 20,000 other people had the same idea.
1462600 1464839 I lost my grip on my sister's hand.
1466919 1469160 I remember the ground was soft.

1471039 1475240 I looked down
and I was standing on all these people.
1475320 1479119 Like a carpet. People who had fallen and...

1479200 1482999 Somewhere in the crowd
there were Infected. It spread fast.

1483079 1486279 No one could run.
All you could do was climb.

1487840 1490799 Climb over more people.
So I did that. I climbed.
1490880 1493160 And I got up on top of this kiosk.

1495360 1500119 Looking down, you couldn't tell
which faces were infected and which weren't.

1500200 1503919 Then I saw my dad.
Not my mum or my sister.

1517440 1522400 We don't have time to get back to the shop
before dark. We should stay here tonight.

1524959 1527679 My room's up at the top.
You two can have that.
1527760 1530959 No, we'll all sleep in the same room. It's safer.
1629439 1631639 Give me a drink of that, will ya?
1640159 1642160 I'll start working on them, then.

1674240 1677079 - That's Mr Bridges.
- Were you bitten?
1677159 1679279 And his daughter. From four doors down.
1682399 1685200 Did any of the blood get in your mouth?
1721519 1723519 Do you have any clothes here?

1726480 1729999 Then get them and get dressed.
We have to leave now.

1730080 1733600 More Infected will be coming.
They always do.

1761200 1764080 How did you know?
How did you know he was infected?

1764159 1767920 - The blood.
- There was blood on me. It was on you.

1767999 1773160 I didn't know he was infected.
He knew. I could see it in his face.

1773240 1777479 If someone gets infected,
you've about 20 seconds to kill them.

1777559 1782480 It might be your brother, your sister
or your oldest friend. It makes no difference.

1782559 1787759 Just so you know where you stand,
if it happens to you, I'll do it in a heartbeat.

1787840 1791879 He was full of plans.
Have you got any plans, Jim?

1791960 1796239 Do you want us to find a cure and
save the world or just fall in love and fuck?
1798800 1801280 Staying alive's as good as it gets.

1857600 1860599 What is it about tower blocks
and shopping trolleys?
1860679 1863640 Stop talking. It's a long way up.
1880840 1882840 Now I do need a break.

1901800 1906880 - Why didn't you say something before?
- I didn't think you'd give a shit.

1908039 1912119 You've got no fat on you
and all you've had to eat is sugar.
1914319 1916480 There isn't a lot we can do about that

1916559 1921440 except pump you full of painkillers
and give you more sugar. As for sugar,

1926920 1929839 Actually,
I did have a can of Tango somewhere.

2004039 2006919 - Open the fucking door!
- Where's Dad?
2007000 2009200 Let them in, Hannah. Let them inside.

2041239 2044200 - Selena.
- Selena. Good to meet you.
2058840 2061040 Calls for a celebration, I'd say.
2061119 2064040 Why don't you all sit down and...
2064119 2066960 Hannah, what have we got to offer?
2067040 2069440 We've got Mum's creme de menthe.

2079960 2082840 - Where are the bloody glasses?
- Middle cupboard.
2082919 2085679 Nah, the good ones. It's a celebration.
2107520 2110479 I know it isn't much but, well, cheers.

2138120 2143480 Sorry we couldn't spare the water.
Same with the toilet. The flush doesn't work.
2145079 2147239 You'll have to use the bucket.
2153520 2156039 Have to empty it each morning.

2156120 2159640 Just chuck it over the balcony.
No mod cons here.
2161440 2164440 Listen, it's late. We're gonna turn in.
2177240 2179520 I'll take the living room. It's fine.

2214719 2218279 - So what do you make of them?
- Well, they're desperate.
2219359 2222080 Probably need us more than we need them.

2232920 2237400 You should be more concerned about
whether they're gonna slow you down.

2237479 2241079 - Because if they slowed you down...
- I'd leave them behind.

2245360 2248759 Then you're gonna wind up
getting yourself killed.
2264160 2267279 You think I don't get it, but I do get it.

2269080 2272920 And I know I'd be dead already
if I hadn't met you.
2303800 2305799 We lost water pressure three weeks ago.

2305880 2309840 I thought we'd be OK with the water
from the other flats. Cisterns and tanks.

2309919 2313000 But it vanishes so quick
you wouldn't believe.

2328800 2332880 You can set up a plastic sheet
to catch dew and condensation.
2332959 2336559 Saw it on TV once, but I can't make it work.
2351960 2354960 Jim, we're not going to be able to stay here.

2363519 2367119 - There's been no broadcasts for weeks.
- Just listen.

2367200 2371600 Salvation is here.
The answer to Infection is here.
2371680 2374560 if you can hear this, you're not alone.

2374639 2378960 There are others like you.
There are other survivors.
2379039 2381160 We are soldiers and we are armed.

2384480 2388880 - Quiet. There's more.
- Our location is the 42nd blockade, M602,

2392320 2396079 - You must find us. Salvation is...
- Now it just repeats.

2396160 2398440 - It's a recording?
- Yeah, it's a recording.
2398519 2401320 But this is where it's telling us to go.

2404920 2409519 The way things are, we might need
two or three days to get up there.

2415160 2420999 Sound carries in this flat. Me and Hannah
do need you more than you need us.

2421080 2424120 - Look, I didn't...
- No, it's OK. It's the truth.
2424199 2426600 I can't leave the block if it's the two of us.

2426680 2430479 Something might happen to me.
Hannah'd be alone. I couldn't risk it.

2432279 2436399 If it's a recording,
the soldiers who made it could be dead.

2436480 2439839 - It's possible.
- That stuff about the answer to Infection...

2439919 2444039 There is no answer!
It's already done all the damage it can!

2444120 2446839 - Maybe they have a cure.
- Maybe they've got nothing.

2446919 2450840 - The only way to find out is to reach them.
- We could die trying, Frank!

2455120 2460600 And anyway, it isn't true what Dad said.
You need us just the same as we need you.

2463920 2468999 And we'll never be safe in the cities.
The soldiers could keep us safe.
2469680 2471680 So we have to try and get there.

2485239 2488840 Just so you know,
I don't take cheques or credit cards.

2516239 2519119 - What do you think?
- It's the most direct route.

2519199 2524240 Then we should take the indirect route.
The one in daylight and not underground.
2541120 2543519 No. See, this is a really shit idea.

2544359 2547599 You know why?
Because it's obviously a shit idea.

2547680 2551879 So we're gonna drive into the tunnel
full of fucking smashed cars...
2551960 2554759 It's really fucking obviously a shit idea!
2588960 2591280 The world's worst place to get a flat.
2591359 2594559 Agreed. I think we'd better do this quick.
2596960 2599039 I've got the wheel. You're on the jack.

2613039 2616440 Do you hear that?
Hey, hey, do you hear that?

2647120 2651240 Forget the jack, Hannah.
There's no time. Just lift, everyone.
2651319 2654439 Grab hold! One, two, three, lift!

2660639 2665559 - Don't look at them! Don't look!
- I can see them! They're coming!

2675999 2678800 - Get the tyre on, Hannah!
- I'm trying.

2691639 2693999 - Get in the car!
- Come on!

2767359 2770799 Don't take anything
that needs to be cooked, OK?
2770880 2772640 I think you can eat that raw.

2779999 2784320 If I never see another chocolate bar again,
it'll be too soon.

2788840 2792319 Now, single malt,
16-year-old, dark, full flavour.
2800080 2803200 Takes out the fire but leaves in the warmth.
2855839 2858800 Either we do this now or we're walking.

2908879 2911440 Like going on holidays
with your aunt!

3005560 3008239 - Find anything, Jim?
- No! Let's get outta here.
3081079 3083959 I can, like, taste the vitamin C.
3084759 3087440 Mmmm, the raisins are so moist.

3146240 3149800 That you'll never hear
another piece of original music again.

3149879 3153879 You'll never read a book
that hasn't already been written,
3154880 3158559 or see a film that hasn't already been shot.
3162880 3166000 Um.... that's what you were thinking.
3169079 3171279 I was thinking I was wrong.

3182240 3186560 It doesn't really mean anything
to Frank and Hannah because...

3187879 3191199 Well, she's got her dad
and he's got his daughter. So...

3193760 3197239 I was wrong when I said
staying alive is as good as it gets.
3200720 3203119 See, that's what I was thinking.

3220159 3223999 It's getting late.
We'd better stay here for the night.
3251159 3253719 Selena didn't seem to have any trouble.

3269840 3273560 Bloody hell. Must've needed
a hell of a prescription for that lot.

3273639 3277759 I didn't need a prescription.
I qualified as a chemist.
3280359 3282839 Not only will we be able to get to sleep

3282919 3286480 but if we're attacked in the middle
of the night, we won't even care.

3286560 3288719 - Two each.
- Not for me, thanks.
3300680 3303279 Come on, Frank. Let her live a little.

3304319 3308159 - Give her half of one.
- All right. We're on.
3381920 3384599 You're having a bad dream, that's all.

3437639 3441000 - Did I miss breakfast?
- You'll sleep through anything.

3441079 3445879 - Did you have a fry-up?
- We'll stop at a pub on the way. Door!

3469440 3473759 Our location
is the 42nd blockade, the M602,
3480920 3483840 The answer to Infection is here.
3518680 3521919 The whole of Manchester, the whole city.
3523679 3525920 No fire crews to put it out.

3651519 3655359 I don't understand, Dad.
Did they leave?

3655440 3658440 - I don't like this. I think we should go.
- No!

3665000 3669639 Vehicles. We should check the vehicles.
There has to be something.

3781279 3784080 - Dad?
- Keep away from me! Keep away from me!
3784159 3786560 Keep away! Keep away! Keep away!
3847200 3849760 Three survivors. One male, two female.
3849839 3853040 I repeat, one male, two female.

3915200 3919880 Well, we've got beds with clean sheets
and a boiler that produces hot water.
3919959 3922279 So you can all have a shower.
3922360 3925559 You look like you need one. Please.

3944680 3949679 It ain't funny. I got loads of cooking to do,
you fucking Doris!
3958120 3961160 She's lost her dad, Jim. That's how she is.

3972960 3976400 Oh, don't do that.
Come on, come on, come on.

3980080 3984880 Hannah is what Frank says she is. Tough,
strong, and she'll cope just like I'll cope.

3984959 3988720 - Just like you'll cope.
- I don't want her to have to fucking cope.
3989960 3992280 I want her to be OK.
3993800 3995880 When Hannah had her dad it was OK.
3995960 3998639 It was OK for them and it was OK for us.

4037120 4040479 - Yeah, we did.
- We must be a disappointment.

4040560 4046440 You were hoping for a full brigade. An army
base with helicopters and a field hospital.

4048759 4052760 - We were just hoping for...
- The answer to Infection.

4057079 4061400 As I said before, it's here. Though
it may not be quite what you imagined.

4061759 4064560 - Just feel lucky to have found you.
- You were lucky.

4064639 4067639 The fire drove hundreds of Infected
out of Manchester.
4067720 4070679 The surrounding area's teeming with them.

4080320 4085960 Flat terrain all round the house. Floodlights
which we've rigged up to a generator.

4089520 4093599 And we've been lacing the ground
with tripwires and land mines.

4093680 4098160 You wouldn't want to mow the lawn,
but if they get in, we hear them.

4101279 4106000 Secondary to protection,
our real job is to rebuild. Start again.
4106079 4108399 The belly of the house. The heart.

4108480 4113520 A wood-fired boiler providing us with hot
water. The first step towards civilisation.
4115679 4117719 Here you are. I'll swap you.

4117800 4120879 - Now don't be throwing it.
- Here, give us some.

4120960 4124839 Don't be fighting.
Will you put that back? Put it back.

4127280 4130160 - What are you cooking, Jones?
- Surprise, sir.

4153560 4158439 Mitchell managed to knock him out cold
and we got a chain round his neck.

4165800 4169679 The idea was to learn something
about Infection.
4191440 4194720 He's telling me he'll never bake bread.

4205880 4211040 And eventually he'll tell me how long
the Infected take to starve to death.
4249160 4251520 You'll have to wait and see
4253840 4256320 We hope it's chips, it's chips
4272039 4275280 Tinned ham, tinned peas, tinned beans and...

4282559 4284919 - It's a feast, Jones.
- Honour of our guests.
4285000 4288079 Absolutely. I was going to propose a toast
4288160 4291160 but this omelette will do just as well.

4306080 4309840 Jones, did you notice while cooking
that these eggs were off?
4309920 4313199 I thought the salt might cover the taste, sir.
4319879 4322560 I don't suppose you can cook, can you?

4323359 4328600 I can't tell you how badly we need
someone with a little flair in the kitchen.

4328679 4333039 What a fucking disappointment.
I saw those eggs, I thought it was Christmas.

4333120 4336239 We'll have eggs again.
Once everything's back to normal.
4336320 4339040 You muppet! Look at him, eh?

4339119 4343000 He's still waiting
for Marks and Spencer's to reopen.

4343079 4347240 - You don't know nothing.
- I think Bill's got a point.
4347319 4350319 If you look at the whole life of the planet,

4352320 4356279 you know, Man has only been around
for a few blinks of an eye.
4357000 4359360 So if the infection wipes us all out,
4360320 4362520 that is a return to normality.

4366360 4369240 - That what you meant, Bill?
- Yeah, yeah.
4369320 4372439 Have you met our New Age sergeant?

4375199 4380200 Tell me, Farrell, exactly why
did you join the army in the first place?

4382879 4386839 This is what I've seen
in the four weeks since Infection.

4389520 4393880 Which is what I saw in the four weeks before
Infection, the four weeks before that...

4393959 4399199 As far back as I care to remember,
people killing people.

4399280 4402759 Which to my mind
puts us in a state of normality now.

4410719 4413559 - You're not eating?
- I don't want to eat.

4416400 4419520 I don't want to eat.
I want to bury my dad.
4420400 4423400 He's one of the people you're talking about.
4427319 4429280 Let's go, let's go, let's go!

4478960 4482439 What do you want, a fucking sweetie?
Keep shooting, you cunt!
4498440 4500640 I ain't never seen that in my life!

4522359 4527760 Listen, sweetheart, you ain't
gonna be needing this any more.
4527839 4529960 Cos you got me to protect you now.

4531679 4536759 You wanna get your hands on a really
big chopper, you just come and see me.

4538320 4540400 - That's an offer, Mitch.
- Give her some.

4546359 4550680 Easy, tiger. You don't wanna go
picking a fight with me, son.

4558080 4560999 - Mitchell, first action on.
- Resecure the perimeter.
4561080 4564400 Then get to it. Jones, Bedford, go with him.
4574440 4577040 Clear the bodies off the lawn.
4579799 4582279 The rest of you, go with him.

4603760 4607799 We're very grateful for your protection
but if we're gonna stay here...

4607880 4609360 - Who have you killed?
- No one.

4609439 4614399 Who have you killed? You wouldn't be alive
now if you hadn't killed somebody.
4621359 4624360 I killed... I killed a boy.

4635519 4640120 But you had to.
Otherwise he'd have killed you.

4660240 4663879 Eight days ago I found Jones
with his gun in his mouth.

4664999 4669519 He said he was going to kill himself
because there was no future.
4669600 4672360 What could I say to him?

4672440 4677440 We fight off the Infected or we wait
until they starve to death and then what?

4678319 4681999 What do nine men do
except wait to die themselves?

4682080 4687960 I moved us from the blockade, I set the radio
broadcasting and I promised them women.

4704799 4706520 - What is it?
- We have to go.

4706600 4708599 - Jim, wait!
- No time! Come on!
4714480 4716360 We get in the car and we go!

4717679 4722039 No! You're not going to keep them here!
You've got to let them go!

4722120 4725239 You can't keep them here!
Stay where you are!
4725320 4727920 I'm not gonna let you keep them here!
4741279 4743520 I want to give you a chance.
4747200 4749400 But I can't let them go.

4776320 4778959 Smithers says
"Women and semen don't mix."

4779040 4781839 And Mr Burns says
"We all know what you think, Smithers."

4781920 4784719 And that was my favourite joke
in The Simpsons.

4784800 4788279 That's what they're doing a few
hundred miles away, across the Channel,

4788360 4792600 across the Atlantic. Eating dinner
and watching the fucking Simpsons!

4792679 4795839 They're sleeping in their beds
next to their wives.

4795920 4801400 But we're here chained to a fucking radiator
because the OC has gone insane!

4802400 4806279 Starting the world again when the rest
of the world hasn't even stopped.
4807600 4810600 Just imagine, just think about it.
4811599 4813799 How could Infection cross the oceans?

4813880 4818000 How could it cross the mountains
and the rivers? It can be stopped.

4818079 4820679 Right now TVs are playing
and planes are flying

4820760 4824600 and the rest of the world
is continuing as fucking normal.

4828720 4832160 What would you do
with a diseased little island?

4840559 4844760 "There is no Infection.
It's just people killing people." He's insane!

4889399 4892399 - Please...
- Believe me, I'm not interested.

4893440 4898360 You see, I'm gonna have the black one.
And I'm gonna make her squirm.

4898439 4902200 Mitchell, I swear to God
it's gonna end badly for you.
4905879 4907880 Get up, you cunt! Fucking move!

4931840 4935120 Come on then,
you fucking pansies. Do me first.
4935199 4937600 No, Mitch. Mitch, just use the gat.

4937679 4940600 - So you're gonna stick me?
- Shoot 'em!

4943319 4946240 Is that how you'd let
your sergeant go out, Jones?

4946319 4948160 - I'll shoot them!
- No, you won't.

4948239 4951559 You'll let him stick me?
Like a fucking dog?

4960479 4964279 You stupid cunt! What are you doing?
You wanna shoot me?

4964360 4968360 - You wanna shoot me? I'll kill you!
- Where's he fucking gone?
4969560 4972280 Fuck it! Get up! Get after him!

4974680 4977759 - Jones, move it!
- I can see him! I can see him!

4987120 4988959 - Can you see him?
- Through there!
5003799 5007120 He's over the wall. He's got no vehicle.

5044559 5048359 The first thing we're going to do
is make you look more presentable.

5048440 5051880 The lady of the house
has an extensive wardrobe
5051959 5054399 which she certainly has no use for.
5055359 5057119 You can't do it to Hannah.

5057200 5060760 Go to the master bedroom,
pick out a wide selection.

5073719 5076400 - It's only dressing up!
- No! Selena!

5076479 5079680 - I thought girls liked dressing up.
- Expensive dresses.

5097680 5101640 You need to leave me alone
with Hannah. OK?

5103440 5107000 - Listen, right. The OC wants...
- He wants us to dress up nice.

5107079 5111079 If you want us to get changed,
you have to leave the room. OK?
5133880 5136640 Come on, lads. Let's leave the room.

5158759 5162560 We're gonna eat these, Hannah, OK?
Come on. Eat these.
5162639 5164720 Are you trying to kill me?
5167039 5169479 I'm making you not care. OK?
5180960 5183520 Stay here and put the dresses on.

5189119 5191600 He went over the wall.
We thought he'd be dead.
5412239 5414599 It sounded like a Claymore to me.

5415600 5419399 All right, I'll go and hit the floods,
take a butcher's.
5422040 5424560 keep an eye on him, will ya?
5437199 5439600 I think they're having an effect.

5454519 5457279 What are you gonna do
if they don't come back?
5458000 5460959 Would you be the officer if Henry was dead?
5461040 5462960 Is that the way it works?

5466360 5470279 I don't think they are coming back.
I think they've been killed.

5488440 5491440 We're gonna get out of here.
Stay with it, Hannah.
5491519 5494240 Don't worry. I feel fine. Really.

5515399 5520720 Oi! Where the fuck are you going?
What's all the fucking shouting about?

5528360 5531599 Don't just stand there,
you soppy cunt! Get after them!
5553119 5555960 What the fuck you gonna do now?

5581440 5585040 - Defend these stairs with your fucking life!
- Hannah!

5756440 5760639 I haven't got any bullets.
I haven't got any fucking bullets!

5821439 5826040 It's just you and me now, darlin'.
But don't worry, I'll get you out of here.

5826120 5830400 Then we'll find a nice little fucking place
somewhere. Just you and me.
5830479 5832720 And we'll live happy ever after, eh?
5894440 5896839 That was longer than a heartbeat.
5910520 5913920 Listen. Listen. It's not all fucked.
5919440 5921839 We're gonna be OK. It's not all fucked.

5921920 5925119 - I've got to explain something.
- Shut up.
5933280 5936720 Hannah, it's OK! He's not infected.
5936799 5938799 But I thought he was biting you.
5938880 5941439 I was kissing her. Are you stoned?
5943680 5945720 We have to get out of here. Come on!
6040000 6042320 Come on, Jim, breathe! Fucking breathe!
6132199 6134760 You looked all right in this, you know.

6155519 6158719 - I can't hear anything!
- I told you, I heard it!
6211919 6214720 Do you think he saw us this time?
